channel.title: shared on Covid-19: Epidemic Reports
channel.description: Recent content in shared on Covid-19: Epidemic Reports

item.title: Pandemic Products Information
item.description: Difficulties on one side, resources from all sides. At present, the epidemic of COVID-19 is outbreaking globally. Epidemic prevention materials in some places are seriously lacking, and they need to be imported from other parts of the world. At the same time, some medical material manufacturers have not found a corresponding market. Our website launches this section of “Pandemic Products Information” to facilitate the smooth flow of information for buyers and sellers.

item.title: Weike Medicine Inc.: Hydrogen peroxide sterilizer
item.description: Contact information: E-mail: Sales@zjweike.com Mobile phone: (+86) 18606631136 Website: <www.zjweike.com> These instruments can be used in hospitals, disease control centers, pharmaceutical factories, schools, shopping malls and any other public place.

item.title: Yueqian Technology Co., Ltd：Infrared temperature measurement and screening terminal
item.description: Phone：(+86) 020-61038926 Website：http://open.gec-lab.com Wechat QR code： The product is suitable for rapid body temperature screening in public places with a large number of personnel. Once an abnormal temperature is found in the inspected person, the software on the computer side will automatically alarm. For details, refer to the following figure (only in Chinese) or contact the producer directly.
